plugins.collection.name: Collections
collection.collection_current_permission: View and map rare species for the following collections
collection.rare_species_reader_available: Can read Rare Species data for all collections
collection.rare_species_reader_current_p: Can read Rare Species data for all collections
collection.create_collection.collection_: The name and acronyms/code identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.
collection.create_collection.institution: The name and acronym in use by the institution having custody of the occurrence records
Select from a list of established institutions
collection.create_collection.type.label: Collection Type
collection.create_collection.type.hint: Select either Preserved Specimen or General Observations
Use Snapshot when there is a separate in-house database maintained in the collection. A Live dataset is when the data is managed directly within the portal and the central database is the portal data
collection.create_collection.category.hi: Set the categories that the collection will fall under. There may be more than one categories added
collection.create_collection.homepage.hi: The url for the homepage of the collection or institution that hosts the collection
collection.create_collection.license.hin: Legal document outlining the use rights of third parties of the data contained in collection.
collection.create_collection.coordinates: Longitude and latitude of physical location of collection or institution hosting collection hosting collection.
collection.create_collection.administrat: Contact info for the main administrator for the collection.
